p: The results from this study revealed that some EOs could be used as an alternative agent for treatment of infections caused by Candida spp. Pelargonium graveolens, but also Cinnamomum cassia essential oils exhibited synergistic activity with amphotericin B, which allows us to conclude that these EOs can be used as a supplement for traditional chemotherapy. Most of the oils were effective in inhibition of mycelia morphological transformation. Our research revealed also that cell membrane seems to be the most important target of ingredients of investigated oils.
